sections.content: Our wedding will take place in the beautiful Riu Palace Costa Mujeres Resort located on the Bahía de Mujeres beach in Cancun, Mexico. This all-inclusive hotel in Costa Mujeres has 600 rooms with the finest amenities, including a minibar, beverage dispensers and balcony or terrace. The facilities of the Hotel Riu Costa Mujeres also include five swimming pools, two of them with swim-up bars, so that you can enjoy a refreshing dip after relaxing in the lounge chairs in the solarium area.

items.item: Guest are required to book a minimum of 3 nights.
To reserve the current room rate, guests are required to pay $150 dollar deposit per person. The remaining balance will be due on February 1, 2024
You can manage your booking and payments throught the Destify website. You will be asked to create an account when booking your reservation.

sections.content: If you have a question or need help with booking, please don’t hesistate to contact us. We will be more than happy to help. You can reach Steve at 832-382-3729 or Betsy at 832-782-2022.
